scripts.clean:all: rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/dist apps/*/dist .turbo packages/*/.turbo apps/*/.turbo
scripts.dev: turbo run build --filter=@prompt-booster/api --filter=@prompt-booster/core --filter=@prompt-booster/ui && turbo run dev --filter=web
scripts.release: cd apps/desktop && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && cd ../.. && git add . && git commit -m "chore: prepare release" && git tag v$(node -e "console.log(require('./apps/desktop/package.json').version)") && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: cd apps/desktop && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && cd ../.. && git add . && git commit -m "chore: prepare minor release" && git tag v$(node -e "console.log(require('./apps/desktop/package.json').version)") && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: cd apps/desktop && npm version major --no-git-tag-version && cd ../.. && git add . && git commit -m "chore: prepare major release" && git tag v$(node -e "console.log(require('./apps/desktop/package.json').version)") && git push && git push --tags
